# TIC UI-Standard

> An Atomic-UI standard library of TIC

---

## Use Sass

> Based on Element-UI

### How to use ?

```scss
@import '~@baozun/ui-standard/variable.scss'
```

### Manual

[Wiki Link](http://wiki.baozun.com/)


---

## Use Less

> Based on Ant-Design

### How to use ?

```scss
@import '~@baozun/ui-standard/variable.less'
```

### Manual

[Wiki Link](http://wiki.baozun.com/)
